com.opengamma.strata.product

Class UnitSecurity<P extends Product>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opengamma.strata.product.UnitSecurity<P>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - the type of the product
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IdentifiableBean, LinkResolvable<UnitSecurity<P>>, StandardIdentifiable, Attributable, Security<P>, Serializable, Bean, ImmutableBean

    public final class UnitSecurity<P extends Product>
extends Object
implements Security<P>, LinkResolvable<UnitSecurity<P>>, ImmutableBean, Serializable
    A standard implementation of a security shared between trades.

    This is the standard implementation of Security. It represents a single unit of the security, such as one equity share or one futures contract.

    The data for a security is split into two parts, the meta-data and the underlying product. The product is intended to represent the financial contract of the security. A product can typically be priced against a model as well as against the market. The security itself holds the primary market identifier and user-defined attributes.

    A Security will typically be referenced by a trade, such as implementations of SecurityTrade.

    Implementations of this interface must be immutable beans.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • resolveLinks

        public UnitSecurity<P> resolveLinks(LinkResolver resolver)
        Resolves all links in this security, returning a fully resolved security.

        This method examines the security, locates any links and resolves them. The result is fully resolved with all data available for use.

        An exception is thrown if a link cannot be resolved.

        Specified by:
        resolveLinks in interface LinkResolvable<UnitSecurity<P extends Product>>
        Parameters:
        resolver - the resolver to use
        Returns:
        the fully resolved security
        Throws:
        LinkResolutionException - if a link cannot be resolved
